type.name: Main
type.summary: Simple Moving Average (SMA) is the average of Close price over a lookback window. See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
type.param: Number of periods in the lookback window.

type.name: Extended
type.summary: Simple Moving Average (SMA) is the average of Close price over a lookback window. This extended variant includes mean absolute deviation (MAD), mean square error (MSE), and mean absolute percentage error (MAPE). See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
type.param: Number of periods in the lookback window.
type.returns: Time series of SMA, MAD, MSE, and MAPE values.
